page.title: 17A School Day
page.content: I get up at 7.30a.m.I go down and have my breakfast.Then I watch some t.v.and after that I get ready to go to school. When I get to school I play football and at 8.45 I go into the classroom then we do spellings.At 10,30 we have break.After break we do writing and we have lunch at 12 o'clock.After lunch we have a 30 minute playtime.At 1 o'clock we do some writing in our folders.Then school ends at 3.15.When I get home I go to the shop with Adam.Then my mum takes me to town and when I come back I play football with Adam and then I change.Afterwards I go into the kitchen and have something to eat.Next I do some reading and then it's bedtime. Owain Davies.
